alert.note: Alert for Goliad (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 9:39PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Goliad County through 1015 PM CDT... At 939 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Charco, or 9 miles west of Goliad, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Goliad, Weesatche and Charco. This includes the following highways... US Highway 183 between mile markers 634 and 642. US Highway 59 between mile markers 662 and 668. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
